chat.description: Once reported, you will automatically leave the chatroom.

block.description: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?

exit.title: Leave Chatroom
exit.description: If you leave, you cannot rejoin this chatroom. Are you sure?

noResponse.title: No Response
noResponse.description:
Have you been waiting, but your buddy hasn't replied?
Our team will check the situation and return your points.
The chat will close automatically afterward.

error.alreadyReported: This content has already been reported.
error.matchDelay: You can match only once a day.
error.blocked: You're not in a relationship that allows chat requests.
